text: The 1972 GP Ouest-France was the 36th edition of the GP Ouest-France cycle race and was held on 22 August 1972. The race started and finished in Plouay. The race was won by Robert Bouloux. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 17" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 40" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 40" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 43" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 11' 08" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 11' 08" |} |} ==References== 1972 Category:1972 in road cycling Category:1972 in French sport
title: 1972 GP Ouest–France
